about.description: Easy to use Python module to extract Exif metadata from tiff and jpeg files.
about.summary: Read Exif metadata from tiff and jpeg files.

name: exifread
raw_recipe:
{% set name = "ExifRead" %}
{% set version = "2.1.2" %}
{% set hash_type = "sha256" %}
{% set hash = "79e244f2eb466709029e8806fe5e2cdd557870c3db5f68954db0ef548d9320ad" %}

package:
  name: {{ name|lower }}
  version: {{ version }}

source:
  fn: {{ name }}-{{ version }}.tar.gz
  url: https://pypi.io/packages/source/{{ name[0] }}/{{ name }}/{{ name }}-{{ version }}.tar.gz
  {{ hash_type }}: {{ hash }}

build:
  number: 0
  script: python setup.py install --single-version-externally-managed --record=record.txt

requirements:
  build:
    - python
    - setuptools
  run:
    - python

test:
  imports:
    - exifread
  commands:
    - EXIF.py --help

about:
  home: https://github.com/ianare/exif-py
  license: BSD 3-Clause
  license_file: LICENSE.txt
  summary: Read Exif metadata from tiff and jpeg files.
  description: |
    Easy to use Python module to extract Exif metadata from tiff and jpeg files.

extra:
  recipe-maintainers:
    - goanpeca
